metadata.title: CVE-2015-6820 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The ff_sbr_apply function in libavcodec/aacsbr.c in FFmpeg before 2.7.2does not check for a matching AAC frame syntax element before proceedingwith Spectral Band Replication calculations, which allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via crafted AAC data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
